command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2QT84xGnBKUugNF.root --database g5LX4x79UdX68RxpKYLQF9 --execute 
-- 删除今天的提交相关数据
DELETE st FROM submission_topics st
INNER JOIN submissions s ON st.submissionId = s.id
INNER JOIN collection_forms cf ON s.collectionFormId = cf.id
WHERE DATE(cf.formDate) = CURDATE();

DELETE sp FROM submission_projects sp
INNER JOIN submissions s ON sp.submissionId = s.id
INNER JOIN collection_forms cf ON s.collectionFormId = cf.id
WHERE DATE(cf.formDate) = CURDATE();

DELETE s FROM submissions s
INNER JOIN collection_forms cf ON s.collectionFormId = cf.id
WHERE DATE(cf.formDate) = CURDATE();

DELETE FROM collection_forms WHERE DATE(formDate) = CURDATE();
